name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 7, Russian media reported that Chinese singer Wang Fang performed a Soviet song "Katyusha" live in the ruins of the Mariupol Theater.
The ruins behind her were once a shelter. In March 2022, the Russian army dropped two 500-kilogram bombs on the site, killing at least a dozen civilians (some say 300), despite the huge "Дети" children written on the ground.
It is reported that this is a delegation of Chinese journalists, patriotic celebrities and public figures visiting the "Donetsk Republic".
Wang Fang, a Chinese folk singer, is the wife of Zhou Xiaoping, a famous Chinese patriotic celebrity.
It is worth noting that she wore a belt from Chanel, a famous brand that insults China, when she sang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @xumouren_yt Any brand that insults China will not escape my eyes!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/O70D2OeSE4

content: On September 8, Foshan was hit by heavy rain. To prevent vehicles from being soaked in water, people used benches to prop up their cars.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhou Xiaoping expressed his support for his wife's performance of Katyusha at the Mariupol Theater. He also said that the theater was bombed by NATO and Ukraine, and that local residents are currently rebuilding the theater with the Russian army to display evidence of Ukraine's crimes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 7, CCTV released a video saying that if you take leave in the 7 days after the National Day holiday, it will make a 17-day holiday, which caused ridicule and reduced the comment area to only 20. As a result, the remaining comments were all mocking, and received hundreds of thousands of likes from netizens. CCTV finally cleared the comment area

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 8, Xi'an University of Technology held military training. To welcome the inspection of the leadership, students were gathered on the playground from 6:00 to rehearse "Hello, leaders, hello, students, you have worked hard" in a neat manner until 11:00 at night. During the rehearsal, an ambulance came to take away students who fainted due to exhaustion, forming a world-famous painting.
